file_insights.changes: Status tracking update - incremented completed subtasks from 8 to 9, session number from 9 to 10, updated last_update timestamp
Added three new optional text input fields (Location, Drawing Reference, Specification Reference) to the RFI form dialog using Controller components with Material-UI TextField
file_insights.pattern: Consistent use of React Hook Form Controller pattern with Material-UI TextField components

patterns_discovered.description: All three new fields follow identical structure: Controller wrapper > TextField with field props, error handling via fieldState, disabled state linked to loading/isSubmitting flags
camelCase naming for form fields (location, drawingReference, specificationReference) consistently applied
All fields use identical error display pattern: error prop checks fieldState.error existence, helperText displays error message
Fields respect both loading and isSubmitting flags to prevent user interaction during async operations

gotchas_discovered.description: Fields are added to form UI but schema/validation rules for these optional fields are not visible in the diff - need to verify they're properly defined in form schema/validation rules

gotchas_discovered.gotcha: No onChange or onBlur handlers shown
gotchas_discovered.description: Fields use default Controller behavior via {...field} spread - any custom validation or side effects on these fields would need to be added separately
New fields are placed after LocalizationProvider closing tag - order may matter for form layout/tab order if not explicitly managed

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully implemented three optional text fields for the RFI form dialog (Location, Drawing Reference, Specification Reference)
approach_outcome.implementation_strategy: Extended existing RFIFormDialog component by adding three new TextField controls following established patterns in the codebase
approach_outcome.code_quality: high - consistent with existing code style and patterns
approach_outcome.scope_completed: Feature implementation only - form submission logic and backend integration assumed to be handled elsewhere

recommendations.recommendation: Verify that validation schema (likely in react-hook-form or similar) includes definitions for the three new optional fields with appropriate constraints
Add test cases for the new fields to ensure they render correctly, display errors, and respond to disabled state changes
Consider extracting the repetitive Controller + TextField pattern into a reusable TextFieldControl component to reduce duplication
Update component documentation or JSDoc to reflect the new optional fields and their intended use cases
Verify that the new fields have appropriate ARIA labels and that form tab order flows naturally with these additions
